external_games.name: Scarlet Fate 2: Quadratic Element Idle Game

name: Scarlet Fate: Knights of Fantasy 2
summary: Scarlet Fate 2 is an adventure placement game with a two-dimensional fantasy theme on the same server around the world. Players can recruit characters, team up to explore the fantasy continent, unearth treasures, unlock long-lost magic and technology, and restore lost civilization, and build a civilized, prosperous and harmonious new world on this continent.
